sources.title: A Happy Family (1935)
sources.description: Krazy has the entire family come to visit: dozens and dozens of cats who behave like the dwarfs who visit Bilbo's house, eating all the food, destroying the dishes and setting fire to the establishment in this good Krazy Kat cartoon. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/a-happy-family-1935/

metadata.Plot: Krazy has the entire family come to visit: dozens and dozens of cats who behave like the dwarfs who visit Bilbo's house, eating all the food, destroying the dishes and setting fire to the establishment in this good Krazy Kat cartoon.Manny Gould and Ben Harrison (no relation to the president) direct this one in rubber-tube animation, which was already being phased out at other cartoon studios in favor of the "animated egg" style. As they did so often, there is a lot of extreme distortion of shape. Harrison's career would last another half-dozen years, but Gould would switch to Scglesinger and remain part of the Termite Terrace until his death forty years later.
